headline: Ecolab Schedules Webcast and Conference Call on February 11th
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., January 07, 2025--Ecolab will host a live webcast to discuss its 2024 fourth quarter results. A news release containing fourth quarter results is expected to be issued before market open on February 11, 2025.
